Share your birthday wishes, thank you no: Happy birthday, Sir Richard! Your kindness and generosity are a true inspiration, and we are so grateful to have you in our lives. May your special day be filled with love, laughter, and all the things you wish for, and may the coming year bring you even more blessings to share with others. Here's to another year of life and all the good it brings!

You are a wonderful soul!  Wishing you a happy, wholesome, family filled birthday! Thank you for everything that you've done and continue to do. You've played a critical role in the success of others and we are proud to have had your support. We are grateful for you and everything you've done. You are a core example of what community means.  Hugs and love <3
Happy Birthday Richard! Thanks for the amazing energy you bring to the PoolTogether community and the crypto space as a whole!

Richard! You are one of the most kind, thoughtful, driven, and unique people I've met in this space. We need more Richards! You karate chop the idea of risk-averse in the face (nfa, DYOR), a bullishness I see as a reflection of your conviction in Crypto and the community behind it. 

I barely knew you and you changed my life this past year. Thank you for encouraging me to use Juicebox to raise funds for my car. In retrospect, that was a trigger event that brought so much positivity and bravery into my life. A few weeks later, I applied to ConsenSys. I had eyed the job before but didn't believe I was 'cut out' for it. Bro, I am literally the puzzle piece that fits into that job, that's how cut out for it I am. I took a powerful community to prove that to me.  

I'm starting my new position as Senior Copywriter at ConsenSys on January 31st :) 

Keep being you. There are other Livsters out there who need you, and your impact on me will allow me to be a Richard to those new Livsters with so much talent, but so little belief in themselves.
